antispoof-name-illegal:
kurinda urujijo, izina ry'umukoresha "$1" ntirishobora gukoreshwa: $2.
hitamo irindi zina.
antispoof-badtype: Izina ry'umukoresha ryatanzwe ni ubwoko butemewe.
antispoof-prohibited: amazina y'abakoresha ntashobora kubamo inyuguti "$1" kuko birabujijwe.
antispoof-combining: Amazina yabakoresha ntashobora kubamo inyuguti zisa "$1".
antispoof-unassigned: amazina yabakoresha ntashobora kubamo inyuguti "$1" kuko n'inyuguti itazwi.
antispoof-deprecated: Amazina yabakoresha ntashobora kubamo inyuguti "$1" kuko yataye agaciro.
antispoof-tooshort: izina ry'umukoresha wawe ni rigufi cyane.
